entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , White Rock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:14 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: White Rock 3:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 6.5°C
Wind: SSE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning except 40 near the Strait of Georgia late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
